title: Sub-Folder Names Started Being Incorrect
creator: Møxx
content:
Since todays update/version (147.0) my Sub-Folders or Titles for each email I have on the Main Folder of each one (Sent, Archives, Spam/Junk, Trash), now they started having the name of the actual Folder in their server, instead of just saying the email name and thats it, something like: "Sent Messages - email", instead of "email" and thats it.

I already tried clicking on Properties and changing the name of the Sub-Folder, but I cant even change it. Also, tried changing that new "mail.useLocalizedFolderNames" on the Config Editor, from true to false, restarting, and still nothing.

I am using 'Unified Folders' view, and the option 'Show full path' is grayed out/disabled in the menu. I cannot uncheck it to fix the long folder names.

So, IDK, if thats something from my side, a bug/something on the new version, etc.
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64; rv:147.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/147.0;os:Windows 11 Pro
